name: Solitaire Premium
description:
Solitaire by Brain Fitness is the first Solitaire game for Android created according to Google Material Design. We’ve optimized layouts in order to give players access to all core functionality in one click. This is a premium version of Solitaire https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gobrainfitness.solitaire We've removed ads from it.

Of course we do have amazing animations, great graphic content and all basic features and game modes. You will enjoy playing Solitaire on phone and tablet. We are constantly improving our software and we are open to your feedback. Feel free to contact us brainfitnessltd@gmail.com if you have any ideas or requests. We will appreciate your comments or suggestions.

Thank you for choosing Solitaire from Brain Fitness. You made the right choice. Happy playing!

Sincerely yours, Brain Fitness team.
